item.title: Kimmel Staffer “Can’t Imagine a Scenario” in Which ABC Late-Night Show Returns
item.description: “If you’re in Hollywood and don’t want to say anything in support publicly … well, f*** you,” says the ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live’ staffer.

item.title: AI vs. MAGA: Populists alarmed by Trump’s embrace of AI, Big Tech
item.description: AI “threatens the common man’s liberty," says GOP Sen. Josh Hawley.
